inclusion.criterion: Acute Coronary Syndrome or coronary heart disease detected on ischemia test and stented
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: included in SCArabée therapeutic education program
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: stable on clinical examination, exercise test, or ultrasound data
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: physical capacity to perform cardiorespiratory test
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: impossibility to submit to follow-up of the study for geographical, social or psychological reasons
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: pregnant woman, parturient, nursing mother, person deprived of liberty by judicial or administrative decision, person making the subject of a legal protection measure
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has abdominal pain and vomiting. He drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day.
